Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk.LicenseException
    As of version 3.1.1, exceptions of this type are no longer thrown by the Affdex SDK, as the licensing mechanism has changed. Existing code that catches this exception (written for an earlier version of the SDK) may be removed.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk.detector.Detector.setDetectAllAppearance(boolean)
    as of version 3.1 in favor of the equivalent -- but more appropriately named -- Detector.setDetectAllAppearances(boolean)
    com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk.detector.Detector.setLicensePath(String)
    as of version 3.1.1 - see new licensing policy: http://developer.affectiva.com
    com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk.detector.Detector.setLicenseStream(Reader)
    as of version 3.1.1 - see new licensing policy: http://developer.affectiva.com
